    2nd WORKSHOP OF T端bingen Women in Machine Learning

    Bridging industry and academia

    October 11, 2024

    MPI-IS, Max-Planck-Ring 4, 72076 T端bingen

    schedule
    8:30 Registration opens
    8:50-9:00 Welcome remarks
    9:00-9:30

    Betty Mohler, Amazon Science, A career in immersive technology centered on human experience
    9:30-10:00

    Auguste Schultz, University of T端bingen, Generative modeling approaches for neural and behavioral data
